subject: Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Despite his brief but impressive résumé and his family ties, Steve Wallace, son of the 1989 Winston Cup champion Rusty Wallace, has had a miserable season.
snippet: Despite his brief but impressive résumé and his family ties, Steve Wallace, son of the 1989 Winston Cup champion Rusty Wallace, has had a miserable season.
